trans-unit.source: Represents the method that handles the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.AdRotator.AdCreated"></xref> event of an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.AdRotator"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 代表處理方法<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.AdRotator.AdCreated"></xref>事件<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.AdRotator"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AdRotator.AdCreated> event is raised when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AdRotator> control displays an advertisement on the page.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AdRotator.AdCreated>就會引發事件時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AdRotator>控制項會顯示在頁面上的公告。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AdRotator> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AdRotator.AdCreated>

trans-unit.source: When you create an AdCreatedEventHandler delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 當您建立 AdCreatedEventHandler 委派時，您可以識別即將處理此事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要將事件與您的事件處理常式產生關聯，將委派的執行個體加入此事件。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時，會呼叫事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information about event handler delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: 如需事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 事件和委派](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115)。
